section.p: A medication should be recorded as a pre-coordinated ingredient + strength + dose form (e.g., "metoprolol 25mg tablet", "amoxicillin 400mg/5mL suspension") where possible. This includes RxNorm codes whose Term Type is SCD (semantic clinical drug), SBD (semantic brand drug), GPCK (generic pack), BPCK (brand pack). The dose (doseQuantity) represents how many of the consumables are to be administered at each administration event. As a result, the dose is always relative to the consumable. Thus, a patient consuming a single "metoprolol 25mg tablet" per administration will have a doseQuantity of "1", whereas a patient consuming "metoprolol" will have a dose of "25 mg".

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-7409, CONF:1098-10506, CONF:1098-32579 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Medication Information template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedMaterial such that it (CONF:1098-7411)
Note: A medication should be recorded as a pre-coordinated ingredient + strength + dose form (e.g., "metoprolol 25mg tablet", "amoxicillin 400mg/5mL suspension") where possible. This includes RxNorm codes whose Term Type is SCD (semantic clinical drug), SBD (semantic brand drug), GPCK (generic pack), BPCK (brand pack).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Clinical Drug 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1010.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-7412)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL conform to Medication Information template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="MANU" (CONF:7408, R2.0=CONF:1098-7408)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:7410, R2.0=CONF:1098-7410)
uniquely represents a particular kind of product

MAY contain [0..1] manufacturerOrganization (Drug Manufacturer) such that it (CONF:7416, R2.0=CONF:1098-7416)
Conforms to Organization from CDA

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedMaterial such that it (CONF:1098-7411)
Note: A medication should be recorded as a pre-coordinated ingredient + strength + dose form (e.g., "metoprolol 25mg tablet", "amoxicillin 400mg/5mL suspension") where possible. This includes RxNorm codes whose Term Type is SCD (semantic clinical drug), SBD (semantic brand drug), GPCK (generic pack), BPCK (brand pack).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Clinical Drug 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1010.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-7412)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

body.codeblock: <manufacturedproduct xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="MANU"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="284673689"/> <manufacturedMaterial> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.88" codeSystemName="RxNorm"/> </manufacturedMaterial> </manufacturedproduct>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7409, CONF:10506 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23"
SHALL conform to CDA Manufactured Product
Consol Medication Information MAY contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:7410, R2.0=CONF:1098-7410)
Consol Medication Information MAY contain [0..1] manufacturerOrganization (Drug Manufacturer) such that it (CONF:7416, R2.0=CONF:1098-7416) Conforms to Organization from CDA
Consol Medication Information SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="MANU" (CONF:7408, R2.0=CONF:1098-7408)
Consol Medication Information SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedMaterial, where its type is Medication Information Manufactured Material (CONF:7411)
Consol Medication Information Manufactured Material code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText
Consol Medication Information Manufactured Material originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference
Consol Medication Information Manufactured Material reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15987)

Consol Medication Information Manufactured Material reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1)
Consol Medication Information Manufactured Material code MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translation
SHALL conform to CDA Material

Consol Medication Information Manufactured Material SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Clinical Drug Name Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.17 DYNAMIC (CONF:7412)
